short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Document your work in Xray, Zephyr & Jira with Sidekick

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sidekick helps document your test cases directly in Xray & Zephyr  for Jira. You will be able to run test cases again and enjoy a better way of documenting your work.

You can view a documentation here:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1eXzamIUutX4JYhjCU8FPT-fjSNRMTe91IS5RJj8HfGM/edit#

Sidekick is a local only extension and does not required any accounts to be created. All your work is saved only locally.
